original_solution_mapping.L2: Caleb has a total of 11+11 = <<11+11=22>>22 candies

original_solution_mapping.L4: He gave the rest which is 36-19 = <<36-19=17>>17 candies to Andy

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1836.
    Returns: the number of more candies Andy has than Caleb.
    """
    # L1
    billy_initial_candies = 6 # Billy took 6 candies with him
    father_gave_billy = 8 # He gave 8 candies to Billy
    billy_total_candies = billy_initial_candies + father_gave_billy

    # L2
    caleb_initial_candies = 11 # Caleb took 11
    father_gave_caleb = 11 # 11 to Caleb
    caleb_total_candies = caleb_initial_candies + father_gave_caleb

    # L3
    total_packet_candies = 36 # a packet of 36 candies
    father_given_out = father_gave_billy + father_gave_caleb

    # L4
    father_gave_andy = total_packet_candies - father_given_out

    # L5
    andy_initial_candies = 9 # Andy left with 9
    andy_total_candies = andy_initial_candies + father_gave_andy

    # L6
    andy_more_than_caleb = andy_total_candies - caleb_total_candies

    # FA
    answer = andy_more_than_caleb
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Billy took some candies and got more from his father for a total of {billy_initial_candies}+{father_gave_billy} = <<{billy_initial_candies}+{father_gave_billy}={billy_total_candies}>>{billy_total_candies} candies
Caleb has a total of {caleb_initial_candies}+{father_gave_caleb} = <<{caleb_initial_candies}+{father_gave_caleb}={caleb_total_candies}>>{caleb_total_candies} candies
Their father gave out {father_gave_billy}+{father_gave_caleb} = <<{father_gave_billy}+{father_gave_caleb}={father_given_out}>>{father_given_out} candies from a pack of {total_packet_candies}
He gave the rest which is {total_packet_candies}-{father_given_out} = <<{total_packet_candies}-{father_given_out}={father_gave_andy}>>{father_gave_andy} candies to Andy
Andy has a total of {andy_initial_candies}+{father_gave_andy} = <<{andy_initial_candies}+{father_gave_andy}={andy_total_candies}>>{andy_total_candies} candies
Andy has {andy_total_candies}-{caleb_total_candies} = <<{andy_total_candies}-{caleb_total_candies}={andy_more_than_caleb}>>{andy_more_than_caleb} more candies than Caleb
